articles.description: The sharp rally in public sector lender's shares drove its market-cap (m-cap) past the Rs 5 lakh crore mark. As of 11:50 am, it was commanding a market cap of Rs 5.03 lakh crore. The lender is placed at the seventh position in the overall m-cap ranking.
articles.content:
Shares of rallied close to 3 per cent to hit record high of Rs 574.7 per share on NSE in Wednesday's trade. Meanwhile, on BSE, the scrip marked a new all-time high of Rs 574.65 apiece.

articles.title: "We Pay Our Employees To Leave": Employees On Notice Period Get 10% Hike In This US Company - NDTV
articles.description: To ensure there are no hard feelings between the company and its employees, even when they are leaving, a marketing agency in the US has a special policy.
articles.content:
Even when an employee gives notice, the company increases their pay by 10%.
A marketing company in the US has stated that they will pay staff members to quit and also offer a 10% pay rise during the… [+1983 chars]
